Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player extends Object
Player class that plays pokemon game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Player(String name)
    Contructs a player and initializes deck or cards, hand of cards, prizePile of cards, discardPile of cards, benchPile of cards and ActivePile of cards.

    addEnergy(int cardNumber)

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player(String name)
      Contructs a player and initializes deck or cards, hand of cards, prizePile of cards, discardPile of cards, benchPile of cards and ActivePile of cards. The pokeDex and trainerDex variables hold all of the types of each type to have an array of all cards of that type. Constructs initial deck
      Parameters:
      name - is the name of the

  • Method Details

    • randomPokemon

      public Pokemon randomPokemon()
      randomly selects a pokemon from pokedex
      Returns:
      returns random pokemon from array of all pokemon types in the game.

    • randomTrainer

      public Trainer randomTrainer()
      randomly selects from all trainers in the game stored in trainerdex.
      Returns:
      returns a random trainer card

      public void drawCard()

    • turn

      public void turn(Player player, Player targetPlayer)
      in a turn a card is drawn next the playerAction is carried out println just for spacing
      Parameters:
      player - current player that is taking the turn
      targetPlayer - opponent player that is taking the turn

    • playCard

      public void playCard(int cardNumber, Player player)
      plays the card selected depending of the instance of card, method carries out specific rules for each card
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - index of card number to be played for trainer card purposes
      player - player that is playing the card

    • addEnergy

      public void addEnergy(int cardNumber)
      checks if the card chosen is energy if the active pile is empty, there is no pokemon to attach the energy to if the card chosen is not an instance of energy, it isnt an energy card adds energy to pokemon in active pile
      Parameters:
      cardNumber - number of card to add

      Parameters:

      player - player playing the card for trainer effects

      Parameters:

    • attackPhase

      public void attackPhase(Player player, Player targetPlayer)
      Since there is an interface for the pokemon to have two attack, this method picks an attack from the two to use using scanner.
      Parameters:
      player - player who has a turn
      targetPlayer - player who is the opponent

    • playerAction

      public void playerAction(Player player, Player targetPlayer)
      while continue turn is true or until the player ends turn allows current player to choose from an action turn continues until player inputs 4 to end turn
      Parameters:
      player - player who has current turn
      targetPlayer - opponent player for that turn
